name: The Mystery of Power-Time
description:
WARNING: The game may go black screen for a few seconds when it's loading, but shortly after you will be able to play it with no problems(hopefully)!

Stealth and fast-paced game where you have multiple powers, but can only use one at a time. Your goal is simple: recover the lost totem while facing hordes of patrolling dinosaurs!

Made by: MikeSundays(code/level_design/ ui/game_design) and Literql(art/game_design)
